short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to bid over the jobs from WritersPro and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application to collect and apply writerpro orders, this is an assistance software for freelance writers that will help them with auto bidding and to get orders for you. You can simply install it and access it using your email address.
